attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
CANCEL THE OLYMPIC GAMES
WHY?
Because this country cannot afford them at this moment in time,it's as simple as that.
We don't have the hospitals or the road network to cope with something as big as the Olympic games, also can somebody point out to me any project that this government has been involved in that the costs have not exceeded the original estimates horrendously.

If we intend to find the money for such a venture then I would suggest it should be spent on finding some top management teams to run our hospitals and our road network and take responsibility away from the government.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions already covering this issue. Please consider signing one of those, rather than setting up your own.
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=olympics
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=olympic+games
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
